com.ibm.jaggr.service.util

Class Features

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.jaggr.service.util.Features

  • public class Features
extends Object
    Convenience class for defining all of the features passed to the aggregator. Provides methods to determine if they exist, and if they are true or false.

      • isFeature

        public boolean isFeature(String feature)
        Checks the value of the specified feature. Will return false for features that have not been specified. Implementations should rely on contains(String) in addition to this method.
        Parameters:
        feature - The feature to check
        Returns:
        If the feature is true.
